thread.title: Life | Watch: John Oliver tears apart America's mental health system on Last Week Tonight
thread.title_full: Life | Watch: John Oliver tears apart America's mental health system on Last Week Tonight - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Watch: John Oliver tears apart America's mental health system on Last Week Tonight
text:
We're not sure just how we managed to get through those three weeks with Last Week Tonight during the mid season break, but we'd rather not think about it.
We're just glad it's back, and our Mondays return to glancing around the office to make sure we're in the clear to watch Sunday Night's episode.
This week John and his team took on the state of America's mental health system, which by all accounts seems like it needs an overhaul. Still, that doesn't mean Oliver didn't have us in stitches. Enjoy.
